title: Looking for more mature aged gamers to play with regularly
body:
AS titled, a lot of the guys I play with are a fair bit younger than me and it would be a nice change of pace to play with gamers my own age(30) every now and again.

 I main jungle and support but play anything bar ADC silver/gold accounts.

IGN: KnifeCatMeowMeow   (I change names regularly due to nothing else to spend IP on so when playing Rengar again decided to change to something silly for lolz... Who want;s to die to a Rengar main with a name like that?)

replies.body: There is a group chat called oldpeoplehere. Some nice guys in there who's hormones have stabilised now that they're 15 years past puberty.
Just joined, is there usually more people in here than this?
It goes up and down. Usually 4-6 people in there. Joovler is a staple and is a good guy to play with.
you're not gonna find mature people on boards.

My reasoning is if I'm here then others are :3

 Also I said mature aged not mature :P
